extractedData.name: Pushparani S
extractedData.title: Web Developer
extractedData.summary: A motivated individual with in-depth knowledge of languages and development tools, seeking a position in a growth-oriented company where I can use my skills to the advantage of the company while having the scope to develop my own skills.

experience.description: Design and implement database schemas for web applications. This includes creating tables, columns, and relationships, and ensuring that the schema meets the needs of the application. Integrate payment processing into web applications. This includes working with payment processors, configuring the integration, and testing the integration. Design and develop REST APIs that meet the needs of clients and users. This includes defining the API's endpoints, parameters, and responses. Integrate third-party APIs into web applications. This includes understanding the third-party API's Conducted Functional, Regression, Integration and System testing to identify the software defects.
